properties.entry: SELECT MV_NO , MV_NAME , MV_OPENDATE , MV_STORY , FPAGE_EXPOSED , MPAGE_EXPOSED , MV_POSTER , MV_PREVIEW , MV_STATUS FROM MOVIE WHERE MV_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM MOVIE WHERE MV_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT M.MV_NO, M.MV_NAME, M.MV_DATE, M.VIEW_RATING, M.MV_OPENDATE, LISTAGG(C.CATEGORY_NAME, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY C.CATEGORY_NAME) AS CATEGORY_NAMES FROM MOVIE M LEFT JOIN MOVIE_CATEGORY MC ON MC.MV_NO = M.MV_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY C ON MC.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO WHERE M.MV_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY M.MV_NO, M.MV_NAME, M.MV_DATE, M.VIEW_RATING, M.MV_OPENDATE ORDER BY M.MV_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT M.MV_NO, M.MV_NAME, M.MV_DATE, M.VIEW_RATING, M.MV_OPENDATE, LISTAGG(C.CATEGORY_NAME, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY C.CATEGORY_NAME) AS CATEGORY_NAMES FROM MOVIE M LEFT JOIN MOVIE_CATEGORY MC ON MC.MV_NO = M.MV_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY C ON MC.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO WHERE MV_STATUS = 'Y' AND MV_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' GROUP BY M.MV_NO, M.MV_NAME, M.MV_DATE, M.VIEW_RATING, M.MV_OPENDATE ORDER BY M.MV_NO DESC
UPDATE MOVIE SET MV_STATUS = 'N' WHERE MV_NO = ?
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET FILE_STATUS = 'N' WHERE REF_TYPE IN (1 ,2) AND REF_NO = ?
